Articles.Content:
This is an informational post only

I have always thought and said that a mod could not easily cause a CTD.

Well, I was wrong.

I got a message about a CTD when QuizTech Aeropack & GPOSpeedFuelPump were used together with a couple of parts.  I was able to determine that it wasn't Quiztech, and posted a message in the GPO thread.

This evening, i got the itch to look at this, I was curious what could be going on.  The code was pretty simple.

It turned out that the part in question was both an engine AND a fuel tank, and GPO was doing a divide-by-zero, which was causing instant CTD and CrashToSpace.

For some reason, I thought that C# was a bit smarter than that.  Obviously not.

I submitted a PR to the maintainer with the fix, hope he gets it out soon
